text: FC Nouadhibou is a Mauritanean professional football club in Nouadhibou. The club was formed in 1999. It plays its home games at the Stade Municipal de Nouadhibou. Their home colours are orange and dark blue and white. == History == ===Beginnings and triumphs=== Football Club Nouadhibou, better known as FC Nouadhibou, is a football club based in the city Nouadhibou. Category:African football clubs Category:Sport in Mauritania
title: FC Nouadhibou
